abstract: Intel Capital, the venture capital arm of chip giant Intel, announced Thursday that it has injected $10 million into security company Iovation, which targets online fraud and abuse based on the identification and “reputation” of Net-enabled devices.
lead_paragraph: Intel Capital, the venture capital arm of chip giant Intel, announced Thursday that it has injected $10 million into security company Iovation, which targets online fraud and abuse based on the identification and “reputation” of Net-enabled devices.

headline.main: Fraud-Buster Iovation Secures $10 Million from Intel Capital
